query:
SELECT 'tenants' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM tenants
UNION ALL
SELECT 'users', COUNT(*) FROM users
UNION ALL
SELECT 'uploads', COUNT(*) FROM uploads
UNION ALL
SELECT 'transactions', COUNT(*) FROM transactions;
